entry.title: Transphobia is perpetuated theough fearmongering and lying. If you read Megyn's tweet and agrees with her - youre being tricked. @netflix do better. #transgender #transathlete #transwomen #sports #womenssports #transwomenarewomen #trans #transgenderathlet

If you read Megyn's tweet and agrees with her - youre being tricked. @netflix do better. #transgender #transathlete #transwomen #sports #womenssports #transwomenarewomen #trans #transgenderathlete #lettranskidsplay #inclusion

entry.title: Unsurprisingly, we received many comments arguing about the fairness of including trans women in women's sports. So I sat down with scientist, researcher, and doctoral candidate Joanna Harper to discuss! Take a listen to this DEAR SCHUYLER episode on Spot
entry.content: Unsurprisingly, we received many comments arguing about the fairness of including trans women in women's sports. So I sat down with scientist, researcher, and doctoral candidate Joanna Harper to discuss! Take a listen to this DEAR SCHUYLER episode on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, YouTube, or wherever you get your podcasts! And, if you're looking for a deeper dive on how to have these conversations about trans athletes, sign up for a workshop at pinkmantaray.com/workshops ğŸ³ï¸â€âš§ï¸ğŸ™ğŸ¼ğŸ’• #dearschuyler #podcast #transgender

entry.title: It was such a joy to sit down with @Dylan Mulvaney and chat about how we hold onto ourselves, our truths, and our joy as openly trans people in this often very transphobic world. Take a listen to this newest episode of DEAR SCHUYLER anywhere you get your
entry.content: It was such a joy to sit down with @Dylan Mulvaney and chat about how we hold onto ourselves, our truths, and our joy as openly trans people in this often very transphobic world. Take a listen to this newest episode of DEAR SCHUYLER anywhere you get your podcasts! And if you have a question you'd like me to address, send me a voice note here or at dearschuyler.com ğŸ™ğŸ¼ğŸ’•ğŸ³ï¸â€âš§ï¸ Brought to you by @Diversion Audio ğŸ¤ #dearschuyler #transgender #boundaries #dylanmulvaney
